title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – May 4 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – May 4 2022
description:
SCOTUS leak puts target on justices with left in meltdown. Clay notes that, "in the world we live in today," unfortunately that could mean "a violent nature target." Kamala and Joy Behar hysterical on abortion media. Roberts should join opinion to make it 6-3 and have it "immediately released," says Clay, to reduce the likelihood of violence. Buck points out that Donald Trump is the most consequential pro-life president in history. Will this decision push suburban women away from GOP in midterms? Hear Elizabeth Warren throw her childish, hysterical tantrum. Clay is back and ready to roll, but notes, as parents nationwide know, "There is a massive difference between a vacation and a family trip... When you have young children, you return more tired than when you actually left."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
